text: Nihsandeha juna manisaharule allahasamgako aphno pratijna ra sapatha sasto molama becdachan tyastako lagi antima dinama kunai bhaga humdaina. Allaha tiniharusita na ta kuro garnecha na ta kiyamataka dina tiniharutira hernecha ra na ta tinala'i pavitra parnecha ra tinala'i kastadayaka sajaya hunecha
